alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 09 at 8:03PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Walton County through 745 PM CST... At 703 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Niceville, moving northeast at 30 mph. At 653 PM CST, a Destin weather station measured a wind gust of 26 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Santa Rosa Beach, De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Freeport, Portland, Pleasant Ridge, Villa Tasso, New Home, Rock Hill, Sandestin and Miramar Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
